name: ChaosBattle
description:
This is a NEAT Neural Network Evolution Sim meets an Auto Battler. See this playlist on my Youtube channel for some idea of what I am talking about: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLkpLgU9B5xIP8O5iqNKFVM2mr4hyji0b

Basically there are 2 teams battling it out and they slowly learn how to fight and win. Eventually my plan is to let the players train their own NerualNets that control the NPCs and then you can battle your friends or other people that have trained their own NPCs.

THIS IS SUPER SUPER EARLY ACCESS: This thing is so early access I probably shouldn't even have posted it yet but I am a big believer in early feedback. If you want to participate in that feedback leave a comment or hop on our Discord( https://discord.gg/xDDMUzR - you might even find a free key in there). 

So right now the only thing that works is the "Scrimmage" > "Load". That will kick off the battle simulation.  

Commands:
[+] speed up time

[-] slow down time

[space] pause

[f] Toggle off follow mode

[Click on an NPC] start following an NPC

[Scroll Wheel] Zoom in/out

Their scores should start going up over time as they learn to battle better.

Objects:

[Sword] for attacking other NPCs

[Shield] Can stun other NPCs and give a little armor

[Med Kit] Can heal other NPCs
